quality_scoring_formula.title: MHP Quality Score (MHP-QS) Formula
quality_scoring_formula.formula: MHP_QS = (0.35 * HEDIS_Composite) + (0.25 * CAHPS_Weighted) + (0.20 * Rx_Adherence_PDC) + (0.15 * Preventive_Completion) + (0.05 * Readmission_Inverse)

components.HEDIS_Composite: Weighted average of tracked HEDIS measures using MHP Measure Weights
components.Rx_Adherence_PDC: Plan-wide average Proportion of Days Covered across all monitored drug classes

measure_weights.title: MHP HEDIS Measure Weights
measure_weights.description: Proprietary weights used in HEDIS_Composite calculation reflecting MHP strategic priorities

COL.name: Colorectal Cancer Screening
COL.rationale: Highest STARS impact per CMS methodology

BCS.name: Breast Cancer Screening
BCS.rationale: High member volume and closure opportunity

Tier_1_Critical.action: Immediate care manager assignment within 24 hours
Tier_1_Critical.escalation: VP of Clinical Operations notified if no contact within 48 hours

Tier_2_High.action: Weekly care coordinator review and outreach
Tier_2_High.escalation: Director of Quality if no engagement within 14 days

Tier_3_Moderate.criteria: Risk score 0.40-0.64 AND exactly 1 open gap
Tier_3_Moderate.action: Monthly automated check-in via MyMeridian portal
Tier_3_Moderate.escalation: Coordinator review if gap not closed within 60 days

standard_cadence.action: Secure message with gap details and scheduling link
Text reminder with appointment booking URL (requires SMS consent)
Care coordinator outbound call during member preferred hours
Second phone attempt plus mailed letter with provider appointment options
Home visit request via community health worker (Tier 1 and Tier 2 only)
Member flagged as non-engaged; escalate to care manager with full outreach history

exceptions.language_barrier: Interpreter services required at all phone/in-person contacts
exceptions.transportation_sdoh: Ride assistance offer included in Day 7+ contacts
exceptions.digital_literacy_low: Skip portal/SMS; begin at Day 7 phone contact

Platinum.incentive: MHP Quality Bonus Program - $2,500 per quarter
Platinum.recognition: Featured in MHP Provider Excellence Report, priority patient panel growth

Gold.recognition: Quality achievement certificate, peer mentoring eligibility

Silver.requirement: Monthly quality coaching session with MHP Quality Advisor

Bronze.incentive: Standard reimbursement with quality withhold at risk
Bronze.requirement: Quality Improvement Plan (QIP) submission within 30 days; quarterly progress review

home_visit.best_for: Non-engaged Tier 1 members with SDOH barriers

gap_closure_priority_algorithm.title: MHP Gap Closure Priority Algorithm

action_routing.middle_60_percent: Queued for care coordinator review within 48 hours

override_rules: Tier 1 members: All actions auto-approved regardless of priority score
Provider-initiated requests: Bypass priority queue, execute immediately
SDOH-flagged members: Add +5 points to priority score

High.strategy: Digital-first outreach via MyMeridian portal and SMS

Medium.strategy: Blended approach with phone as primary channel

Low.strategy: High-touch with care coordinator assignment and in-person outreach
